activities:
Visitors to NTT DATA's website may provide personal information, such as name and contact information, to inquire about NTT DATA's services or to seek marketing information.  In addition, NTT DATA's website may automatically collect information, such as internet address, from which users visit the website.  NTT DATA will collect, transfer and use this information in accordance with its privacy policy and for the purposes for which it was provided.
In addition, NTT DATA may transfer personal information provided by clients in connection with NTT DATA's provision of services to those clients.  Any such information is transferred for processing purposes only and in accordance with and to further the purpose of NTT DATA's contracts with its clients.
